history.p: Following the hugely successful premiere of the First Symphony (CNW 25) in March 1894, Nielsen composed Symphonisk Suite. The second movement is dated 23 May 1894, whilst the rest of the Suite was finished towards the end of August.

bibl.title: Motiv Fortegnelse Carl Nielsen: Symphonisk Suite
